translations: 包围，围攻；使处于困境，困扰

sentences.sentence: Civilian trap in the beleaguer city has been airlifted to safety.
sentences.translation: 被围困在城里的老百姓已空运到安全地区。

sentences.sentence: Even today, in some parts of China, it is common practice for a man to seek justice by summoning his family and their Allies to beleaguer the home of the person who wronged him.
sentences.translation: 人们受了欺负，便召来家里人和亲戚围攻仇家，这在今天中国的一些地方还是司空见惯的。
